EmailTemplate.subject: Important Update: Freight Rate Adjustments for ATM Shipments
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Important Update: Freight Rate Adjustments for ATM Shipments To our valued Channel Partners, NCR is committed to being a reliable provider of high-quality products and services to help our shared customers run their businesses. Due to market and supply-chain dynamics, we conduct regular reviews of the costs involved in doing so and make requisite adjustments as appropriate. As part of regular review of freight costs in the United States, NCR will be adjusting the default freight charges for all ATM classes, effective May 1, 2023 (detailed below). This follows a detailed, multi-faceted freight cost analysis of our ATM portfolio, resulting in freight charge increases and decreases dependent on ATM class. These changes will be reflected in NCR quoting systems on May 1, 2023. ATM Freight Rates (effective 5/1/2023) ATM Class Price (Per Unit) 2012 $1,300 6623 $1,088 6625 $1,396 6627 $1,266 6628 $1,412 2062 $1,675 2063 $1,425 2064 $1,750 6681 $2,601 6682 $2,267 6684 $2,328 6687 $1,571 6688 $2,572 We plan to continue reviewing our costs on a regular basis, and will re-evaluate pricing as the economic environment continues to change. Thank you for your continued partnership and collaboration through this process, and please reach out to your CAM with any questions.
